title: 'Boys and Girl - Rams Week 1 Reaction with David Helman; Fact Checking Mike McCarthy's Analytics Conversion
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Rams Week 1 Reaction with David Helman; Fact Checking Mike McCarthy's Analytics Conversion
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane is off, but David Helman from DallasCowboys.com joins Bobby to break down the Rams game, evaluate how real Mike McCarthy’s analytics conversion is, and the latest on the Cowboys’ injury situation. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
